TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataColumnChangeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> event occurs when a change is made to the value of a column in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataColumnChangeEventArgs (System.Data.DataRow row, System.Data.DataColumn column, object value);

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the proposed new value for the column.
